https://tmrev.io/movie/663159-Bruges 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jjpbUJn616Eo7WYUI7w7Xmn36Nk.jpg “Bruges” depicts life in a hotel room in a quaint, Belgian tourist town. Residents are also depicted walking and cycling to work on one of the city’s many canal bridges, as wildlife experiences its own reality in the waters below. A fine example of Jennings’ skillful editing. Bruges
